Tax-loss selling, sector lawsuits, and recent earnings misses have pressured SJM, but these appear transitory given the company's stable fundamentals. result.title: J. M. Smucker: Coffee Relief Is Coming (Rating Upgrade)
result.text: The J. M. Smucker Company is upgraded to 'hold' as coffee tariff relief should drive margin recovery in the coming quarters. SJM's Q2 showed persistent margin pressure despite 3% revenue growth, with coffee price hikes unable to fully offset tariff costs. Pet food and frozen handheld segments remain weak, while deleveraging remains a priority due to elevated debt from past M&A.

result.title: J.M. Smucker forecasts annual profit below estimates as coffee inflation bites
result.text: J.M. Smucker on Tuesday forecast annual profit below analysts' estimates as a surge in coffee costs is expected to squeeze its margin, sending shares of the food maker down 3%.
